original_text: Then he shall take the two goats and set them before the Lord at the entrance of the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 또 그 두 염소를 가지고 회막 문 여호와 앞에 두고

sentences.original_text: Then he shall take the two goats
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 두 염소를 데려올 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: and set them before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 주 앞에 둘 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: at the entrance of the tent of meeting.
